courseDescription:
In this free online motivation course you will learn how you can transform your life and career. This motivation course covers all the major skills of motivation you need to be massively successful. Giving you the key tools, strategies and techniques you need to take your Life and career to the next level. Learn how to realize your full potential!

Learning these key motivation skills and techniques can help you be massively successful. Once you can master these key skills and techniques. Your potential is limitless! Motivation is a key life skill. Remember: You can't get the slightest thing done, until first motivated.

If you are having issues motivating yourself or getting things done in a timely manner or have a family member or friend who is dealing with it, this is a great course for you. Students, Employees, Business Owners or anybody will greatly benefit from this introductory training. Many are capable but not motivated. This training can help you acquire the basic skills you need to deal with this challenge the right way.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Motivation is something everyone has inside of them. People can't take the slightest action without motivation. There are many different things that can motivate you to do something or to not do something in your life. This course will teach you exactly how effective motivation really works and how you can boost it significantly.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: Motivation is a reason or set of reasons to accomplish something or behave in a particular manner. This module explains the different strategies in dealing with motivation. Students will learn the proper way of nurturing good thoughts that will be most helpful to achieve their dreams and aspirations.

slides:
• Motivation - Learning Outcomes

  • After completing this module you will be able to:

    • Describe what Motivation and De-Motivation is.
    • Discuss the importance of Motivation Mastery.
    • Discuss the factors contributing to Motivation and De-Motivation.
    • Discuss how Motivation can overcome bad habits.
    • Discuss the different types of Motivation.
    • Explain where Motivation comes from. 
    • Discuss how to conquer De-Motivation.

  • Introduction - Motivation Beginning Concepts

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Understanding What Motivation Is

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • The Mind Game of Motivation

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Understanding De-Motivation

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Motivation In Your Personal Life

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Motivation - Learning Summary

  • Key Points In The Training:

    • "Motivation Mastery" is the skill of getting your motivation to work around the clock for you on auto-pilot.
    • Motivation comes from multiple sources.
    • Motivation is an aspect of your personality that only you can control.
    • It is critical to identify the types of motivation in your life. This gives you leverage.
    • Discover what de-motivates you. Destroy it and replace it with motivators
    • There is no going back one you've made a serious life choice. Motivation tries to thrust you forward by making sure the step you took was the largest step you could take.

  • Motivation - Learning Outcomes

  • After completing this module you will be able to:

    • Recognize the difference between motivation and de-motivation.
    • Explain that mistakes made along the way are normal and can be helpful.
    • Discuss the misconceptions about motivation.
    • Recall what motivation does for you each and every day, considering how much you achieve daily.
    • Explain that motivation is the tiny voice inside that reminds us of the things that we need to do.
    • State how motivation is the push we give to ourselves to get things done.

  • Mastering Your Mistakes

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Misconceptions About Motivation

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • How To Keep Motivated

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Motivation - Hero And Villain

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Conclusion - Final Thoughts and Ideas

  • Select your Video URL in the Edit Panel

  • Motivation - Learning Summary

  • Key Points In The Training:

    • You can't do the slightest thing, until first motivated.
    • Motivation is the push that we need when something needs to be done.
    • Motivation is that tiny voice inside your head encouraging your to do something
    • Motivation drives you forward and de-motivation saps your energy and slows you down.
    • Motivation gave us a lot of achievements in life.
    • Encountering mistakes along the way is normal and can be beneficial.
    • Nothing is left unturned when you are motivated.
    • Motivation is the driving force in life and can work on auto-pilot.
